 @dev payable function

@notice request current Price from Chainlink oracle.
 @return get current price from Chainlink

@notice request price guess
 @return priceGuess as an int because of compatability with Chainlink

@notice request counter bet amount
 @return uint betAmountCounter

@notice accept the bet, ideally after looking into the specifics
 @dev payable function

 @return get current price from Chainlink

@notice request price guess
 @return priceGuess as an int because of compatability with Chainlink

devdoc.author: ThorbenSpanka
devdoc.details: this contract inherits from chainlinks ETHUSD Price Orakle

returns._0: priceGuess as an int because of compatability with Chainlink

placeBet(uint256,uint256,int256).details: This function includes a call to the price oracle from inherited contract. The function is payable.

params._betAmount: How much you want to bet in Wei
params._betAmountCounter: How much the BetTaker should bet
params._priceGuess: betting the future price will be higher equal than the price guess  that there is an active bet going on for someone to take

resolveBet().details: payable function, sending ETH to winner of Bet returns an address of the bet winner

devdoc.title: Gambling on ETH

getCurrentPrice().notice: request current Price from Chainlink oracle.

placeBet(uint256,uint256,int256).notice: Function to place a bet on future ETHUSD Price

resolveBet().notice: resolving the bet, if this does not happen on time, the Eth will become part of next bets price pool. Bet can only be resolved 60 minutes after Bet has been placedand only until 70 min after it.

takeBet().notice: accept the bet, ideally after looking into the specifics

userdoc.notice: betting wether Ether USD Price is going up or down in the next 2-3 minutes
